The Planets (Live at Coconut Monkey Studios)

The Planets is the third single from Portland-based alt-punk band combobox.

Artists
  • combobox
Genres
  • Punk
  • Alt-rock
Type single
Published April 27, 2024
Links
  • https://open.spotify.com/album/1FFOs8zhwEQba68chqisGb?si=WsvbQ7v6SLm2FtLv5_1ynQ

The Planets is combobox at their most bombastic. Loud, propulsive drums coupled with a repetitive, aggressive motif keep the short track moving forward, and the rapid flow of spoken and yelled lyrics pithced against frenetic, jagged guitar parts provide for a track that is at once in-your-face and tongue-in-cheek.

  • The Planets (Live at Coconut Monkey Studios)
